DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluation inflammatory heal profile root coverage use Enamel Matrix Derivative . 16 volunteer select submit root coverage surgery subepithelial connective tissue graft , without enamel matrix derivative . The patient screen base follow inclusion criterion : bilateral recession maxillary anterior homologous teeth aesthetical complain ou hypersensitivity , non-smokers , healthy use medication compromise periodontal health healing . The split-mouth randomized model follow relation test control sit . The following clinical parameter analyze baseline 6-month post-surgery : recession height , recession width , width keratinize tissue , probe depth , clinical attachment level , gingival thickness . In addition surgical analysis , evaluation follow inflammatory marker perform : IL-1β , IL -1RA , IL-2 , IL-4 , IL-5 , IL-6 , IL-7 , IL-8 , IL-9 , IL-10 , IL12 , IL-13 , IL-15 , IL-17 , EOTAXIN , FGF , GCSF , GMCSF , IFN-y , IP-10 , MCP-1 , MIP 1a , PDGF-bb , MIP 1b , RANTES , TNF-α e VEGF . These evaluation perform baseline , 7 14 day surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Inflammatory Healing Profile After Root Coverage With Emdogain®
